title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the desired features, functionalities, performance specifications, and system constraints for the BrainwaveDriverAssistant system. Ensure that the requirements cover driver monitoring, fatigue and distraction detection, alert mechanisms, data privacy and security considerations, integration with vehicle systems, and regulatory compliance.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, data flow, and integration with vehicle systems.

title: Develop Brainwave Monitoring Module
description: Implement the module responsible for capturing and processing the driver's brainwave data.

title: Develop Driver Attention and Fatigue Detection
description: Implement algorithms and models to detect driver attention levels and fatigue based on brainwave data.

title: Develop Vehicle Integration Module
description: Implement the module responsible for integrating with the vehicle's systems, such as alerts, notifications, and safety mechanisms.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the BrainwaveDriverAssistant system, including dashboards, alerts, and configuration options.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for storing and retrieving brainwave data, driver profiles, and system logs.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect the driver's brainwave data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the BrainwaveDriverAssistant system.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the system's functionality, performance, and reliability.
dependencies: Develop Driver Attention and Fatigue Detection

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the BrainwaveDriverAssistant system.

title: Conduct Pilot Deployment and Evaluation
description: Deploy the BrainwaveDriverAssistant system in a controlled environment for pilot testing and evaluation, gathering feedback from users and stakeholders.
dependencies: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance

title: Finalize and Deploy Production System
description: Incorporate feedback from the pilot deployment, make necessary adjustments, and deploy the final BrainwaveDriverAssistant system for production use.
